sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: What is the perimeter of a regular hexagon with each side measuring 5 cm?
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a regular hexagon, simply multiply the length of one side by the number of sides. In this case, each side measures 5 cm and there are 6 sides.

Perimeter = (side length) × (number of sides)
Perimeter = 5 cm × 6
Perimeter = 30 cm

The perimeter of the regular hexagon is 30 cm.
